page.title: 17NORTH DENES HELIPORT
page.content: BOND HELICOPTERS; NORTH DENES AIRFIELD;GT. YARMOUTH We visited North Denes Heliport & met a pilot,Simon Bedford. We were shown an orange safety suit which was waterproof with two red plastic grids. It has a hood,a long zip and a strap to go over the zip. Inside the sleeves there are two blue gloves uswd for the cold weather.To wear it you must remove footware,tuck in the neckflap,pull up the zip & fasten the strap. A lifejacket is also worn around the waist. It is folded up & secured in a packet. To inflate you must pull out straps, hold the bag around your waist,raise over your head and pull the toggle. Marsha tried it on."I felt really silly. The suit was rather large for me, but it was warm inside.I couldn't help laughing".
